trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_SEQ_00<tab>All warriors must choose their own path, as Gosetsu well knows.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_TODO_00<tab>Search for Yugiri.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_TODO_01<tab>Rendezvous with Yugiri at Yuzuka Manor.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_GOSETSU_000_000<tab>I will not pursue her. It is for her to think on our master's words and recognize the futility of her course.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_GOSETSU_000_001<tab>Those, at least, are my thoughts upon the matter. Yours may be different. Should you wish to give chase, I will not bar your path.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_GOSETSU_000_002<tab>...We each have but one life, and it is not to be spent recklessly in pursuit of our goals. I pray she realizes this soon...
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_GOSETSU_000_010<tab>Zenos will fall, but not to a desperate knife in the dark. We will need to plan and prepare, and she has done neither.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_020<tab>...Did Gosetsu send you to stop me?
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_021<tab>Then you came of your own free will? I should be surprised if you agreed with my chosen course. No one else did.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_022<tab>But it is not as fanciful as they would have you believe. Scant moments ago, I received the crown prince's itinerary from one of our spies in the castle.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_023<tab>'Twould seem that Zenos has no desire to remain in Doma any longer than necessary. He wishes to inspect the Moon Gates this very eve.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_024<tab>His impatience is to our advantage. He arrived without warning and gave Yotsuyu no time to prepare. The whole castle is in state of upheaval.

TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_025<tab>To avoid any delay, he has declined a full escort, and will be traveling with no more than a handful of soldiers. The kami could not have blessed us with more auspicious circumstances. I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> kill him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I will.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_Q1_000_026<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_A1_000_027<tab>You mean <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> will kill him.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_A1_000_028<tab>Not alone.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_029<tab>...Or die trying. You understand the risks.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_030<tab>Forgive me. Of course you do. Mayhap better than I.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_031<tab>...But are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_032<tab>I know the odds. I know what he is capable of, and that in an open confrontation, I will likely die.

TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_033<tab>But if I do not─if I succeed, then countless lives will be saved. Doma, Ala Mhigo─everything will change! One life for that world is a price I would pay a thousand times over!
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_034<tab>...What? What is it? Why are you looking at me like that?
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_035<tab>...Do you mean to <var 1A 02 /var>join me<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_036<tab>Thank you. Thank you. I...I cannot well express what this means to me.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_037<tab>We have much to discuss, but we can do so on the way.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_038<tab>Yuzuka Manor is some distance from here. We must hurry!
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_ISSE_000_039<tab>...Stay calm. No one knows you were here. No one knows you saw anything.
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_ISSE_000_040<tab>No one knows you overheard two rebels plotting...to kill the crown prince...
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_ISSE_000_041<tab>Gah! Stupid, stupid, stupid! You know how this ends! And they only have themselves to blame! You have to tell them. You have to...
TEXT_STMBDA326_02935_YUGIRI_000_050<tab>This is far enough. Let us discuss our plan of attack...
